Class which can be overriden by targets to enforce instruction dependencies and behaviours that aren&#39;t expressed well enough within the scheduling model for mca to automatically simulate them properly. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/custombehaviour/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

This class allows targets to optionally customize the logic that resolves scheduling class IDs. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/instrumentmanager/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

This file defines the base class CustomBehaviour which can be inherited from by specific targets (ex.

llvm/tools/llvm-mca/lib/X86CustomBehaviour.h). CustomBehaviour is designed to enforce custom behaviour and dependencies within the llvm-mca pipeline simulation that llvm-mca isn&#39;t already capable of extracting from the Scheduling Models.

<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/custombehaviour/#a62666ccd5a13e55da4d4b03c80a4c75f"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/custombehaviour/#a62666ccd5a13e55da4d4b03c80a4c75f">~CustomBehaviour</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Before the llvm-mca pipeline dispatches an instruction, it first checks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// for any register or resource dependencies / hazards. If it doesn&#39;t find</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// any, this method will be invoked to determine if there are any custom</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// hazards that the instruction needs to wait for.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The return value of this method is the number of cycles that the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instruction needs to wait for.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It&#39;s safe to underestimate the number of cycles to wait for since these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// checks will be invoked again before the intruction gets dispatched.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// However, it&#39;s not safe (accurate) to overestimate the number of cycles</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to wait for since the instruction will wait for AT LEAST that number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// cycles before attempting to be dispatched again.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/custombehaviour/#a1733693fc63741279331007c38453223">checkCustomHazard</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;InstRef&gt;</a> IssuedInst,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/instref">InstRef</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Functions that target CBs can override to return a list of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// target specific Views that need to live within /lib/Target/ so that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// they can benefit from the target CB or from backend functionality that is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not already exposed through MC-layer classes. Keep in mind that how this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function is used is that the function is called within llvm-mca.cpp and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then each unique&#95;ptr&lt;View&gt; is passed into the PipelinePrinter::addView()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function. This function will then std::move the View into its own vector of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Views. So any CB that overrides this function needs to make sure that they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are not relying on the current address or reference of the View</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unique&#95;ptrs. If you do need the CB and View to be able to communicate with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// each other, consider giving the View a reference or pointer to the CB when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the View is constructed. Then the View can query the CB for information</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when it needs it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return a vector of Views that will be added before all other Views.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::vector&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;View&gt;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/custombehaviour/#ad9342f37242dde1bc862f0441a82fd5e">getStartViews</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstprinter">llvm::MCInstPrinter</a> &amp;IP, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">llvm::ArrayRef&lt;llvm::MCInst&gt;</a> Insts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return a vector of Views that will be added after the InstructionInfoView.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::vector&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;View&gt;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/custombehaviour/#a6d04044329947a112b3194db8b15a49e">getPostInstrInfoViews</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstprinter">llvm::MCInstPrinter</a> &amp;IP,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">llvm::ArrayRef&lt;llvm::MCInst&gt;</a> Insts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return a vector of Views that will be added after all other Views.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::vector&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;View&gt;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/custombehaviour/#a0a73f42bda40682efac9f25123e4e8bd">getEndViews</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstprinter">llvm::MCInstPrinter</a> &amp;IP, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">llvm::ArrayRef&lt;llvm::MCInst&gt;</a> Insts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
